participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: outgoing and sporty, enjoys conversations about fitness and dogs.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Aisha
participant_2.personality: free-spirited and creative, passionate about swimming and enjoys heavy music.
participant_2.background: my family and i are from india. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my favorite music genre is death metal. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.
